It pisses me off that EVERYTHING is paywalled. When using Spotify with my phone in flight mode, the phone gets hot and the battery drains fast. If I reboot my phone, Spotify cannot be reopened until I take the phone out of flight mode: The phone needs to have an active internet connection in order to open the app after turning on my phone. I've just spent 6 euros on inflight wifi just to bring Spotify back to life so I can listen to the podcasts I downloaded for an 11 hour flight.

So let me get this straight, non premium users can now select the songs they want to listen to and do almost all of the things I pay $16 a month to be able to do, and NOW I get to listen to ads in the middle of my podcasts. I just paid for this month, but I'm thinking I'm done with Spotify now unless it's fixed.

You asked for a rating so I'm giving you one. The app is pretty bad. The desktop application is pretty good now, but the app is so bad. If you have a large library (>10,000 songs) and try to just press play and shuffle your library, it regularly takes around 5 minutes until the first song starts playing. Then when I try to skip a song, it doesn't play the next song but just sits there showing blank album art for a minute (still playing the last song) then gives up and just shows the song that was already playing. I'll try again and wait for like 60 seconds before it decides to move to the next song. It's not hard to make an app shuffle a lot of songs. Please make this basic functionality work. Spotify is also horrible at playing podcasts, regularly glitching out past a certain length, and forgetting my play position. I gave up and use a separate app for podcasts (which is way better), but spotify now CONSTANTLY tries to force podcasts in my face and "recommend" stupid podcasts, which in reality is just shoving ads in my face, for things I don't want, despite me paying for premium, and hundreds of people giving you guys feedback that we want all podcasts hidden or removed automatically (not by manually going into a "music" tab). You're even trying to turn yourself into tiktok/youtube and now forcing AUTOPLAYING VIDEO podcasts on my home page when I open the app. I DON'T WANT THIS VIDEO GARBAGE IN MY MUSIC APP I PAY FOR. GET RID OF IT. You don't even give us a setting to hide podcasts, to hide videos, or even to disable autoplay of videos (and the "workaround" of enabling the "low bandwidth" mode in settings IS NOT A SOLUTION TO THIS). And when I complain to your "customer support", it's just an AI chatbot telling me I can disable this and making up a setting that doesn't exist, because that's what LLMs do. They're not actual support. They just make up nonsense then say sorry goodbye. Please listen to your customers (and your paying customers) and stop making stupid decisions and forcing stupid stuff on us. Oh ya, playlist search doesn't really work either (I only have a couple hundred playlists) and there's no search box if you go into a folder. Also it's dumb that when you add a song to a playlist, it shows a green checkmark next to it like you added it to your liked songs. I regularly add a bunch of albums I haven't heard yet into playlists in a "to listen to" folder and now I can't tell what I've heard already cuz it looks like it's all saved to my library. I still like you as a service in general and despise apple, I just want you to do better and want to actually enjoy music on my phone effortlessly without all these stupid issues.

It's lost its soul, fun and frankly any differentiator it used to have
